item.title: 凯雷支持的 StandardAero 在美国 IPO 的目标估值为 75 亿美元
item.description: 由收购公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）支持的航空服务提供商标准航空（StandardAero）周一表示，该公司正在美国进行首次公开募股，寻求最高 75 亿美元的估值。【原文：Aviation service provider StandardAero, backed by buyout firm Carlyle Group , said on Monday it is seeking a valuation of up to $7.5 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 中国汽车工业协会向政府表达对经销商亏损的担忧
item.description: 中国汽车流通协会（CADA）周一表示，今年前八个月，由于被迫以大幅折扣出售新车，汽车经销商合计亏损 1,380 亿元人民币（195.5 亿美元）。【原文：Car dealers incurred combined losses of 138 billion yuan ($19.55 billion) in the first eight months of the year as they were forced to sell new cars at sizable discounts, the China Automobile Dealers Association (CADA) said on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金在利率下降之际抢购美国科技股，高盛集团称
item.description: 路透社周一看到的一份高盛（Goldman Sachs）主要经纪商给客户的说明称，受美联储预期降息 50 个基点的刺激，对冲基金上周以四个月来最快的速度买入了美国科技股和传媒股。【原文：Hedge funds bought U.S. tech and media stocks at the fastest pace in four months last week, said a Goldman Sachs prime brokerage note to clients seen by Reuters on Monday, spurred by the Federal Reserve's anticipated 50-basis point rate cut.】

item.title: 裕信银行通过衍生品进一步收购德国商业银行 11.5%的股份，力争将持股比例提升至 29.9
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）表示，在向监管机构提出申请以达到对这家德国竞争对手 29.9% 的持股比例后，该行已于周一通过金融工具进一步收购了德国商业银行 11.5% 的股份。【原文：UniCredit said it had acquired on Monday, through financial instruments, a further 11.5% of Commerzbank after applying to supervisors to reach a holding of up to 29.9% in the German rival.】

item.title: 关注美联储发言人和经济数据，期价持稳
item.description: 在美联储启动宽松周期数日之后，投资者在等待多位政策制定者的评论和数据，以判断利率前景和经济健康状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Monday, as investors awaited comments from a bunch of policymakers and data to gauge the outlook for interest rates and the economy's health, days after the Federal Reserve commenced its easing cycle.】

item.title: 早间新闻美联储考虑通胀下行，欧洲收缩
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 白宫吹捧 10 亿美元基金帮助汽车供应商为电动汽车重新装备
item.description: 投资公司门罗资本有限责任公司（Monroe Capital LLC）周一表示，随着汽车行业从汽油车向电动车的转变，该公司计划启动一项高达 10 亿美元的新基金，为小型汽车供应商提供贷款。【原文：Investment firm Monroe Capital LLC said on Monday it plans to launch a fresh fund of up to $1 billion to provide loans for smaller auto suppliers as the industry shifts from gasoline-powered to electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美联储降息会让钱装进口袋，但情绪转变可能需要时间
item.description: 甚至在美联储上周批准大幅降息半个百分点之前，金融市场就已经开始为家庭和企业降低信贷成本，因为它们竞相降低抵押贷款利率，削减公司债券收益率，并削减消费者为个人、汽车和其他贷款支付的费用。【原文：Even before the Federal Reserve approved its outsized half-percentage-point interest rate cut last week, financial markets had begun making credit cheaper for households and businesses as they bid down mortgage rates, cut corporate bond yields, and chipped away at what consumers pay for personal, auto and other loans.】

item.title: KKR 为首支北美中型市场交易基金融资 46 亿美元
item.description: 美国私募股权公司 KKR & Co 周一告诉路透社，尽管高利率抑制了投资者对债务驱动型收购的兴趣，导致筹资环境困难重重，但 KKR & Co 已为其专注于北美中型交易的首只基金筹集了 46 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co has raised $4.6 billion for its debut fund focused on mid-sized deals in North America despite a difficult fundraising environment as high interest rates dampened investors' appetite for debt-driven buyouts, the U.S. private equity firm told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行签署收购汇丰银行德国私人银行部门的协议
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas BNPP.PA）周一表示，已签署协议收购汇丰银行（HSBC）在德国的私人银行业务部门。 法国巴黎银行周一表示，该行已签署收购汇丰银行德国私人银行部门的协议，以继续扩大其在财富管理领域的业务范围。【原文：BNP Paribas BNPP.PA has signed a deal to buy HSBC's private banking unit in Germany as it continues to expand its footprint in wealth management, the French lender said on Monday.】

item.title: 德国商业银行股价下跌 3%，德国政府保留股份
item.description: 德国商业银行股价周一下跌 3.1%，此前政府表示将暂时保留其持有的这家德国银行 12% 的股份，此举很可能会搁置与意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的合并。【原文：Shares of Commerzbank traded 3.1% lower on Monday after the government said that it would retain its 12% stake in the German bank for now in a move that will likely keep any merger with Italy's UniCredit on hold.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司因 IT 故障导致西雅图停飞
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）周一表示，该公司经历了一次 IT 故障，对其运营造成了严重干扰，包括航班延误。【原文：Alaska Airlines said on Monday that it experienced an IT outage that caused significant disruption to its operation, including delayed flights.】

item.title: 英国大型投资者准备买入跌势中的美国房地产
item.description: 英国投资管理公司Legal & General和施罗德（Schroders）告诉路透社，它们将向美国的商业地产投资数亿美元，但在很大程度上会避开遭受重创的办公楼领域。【原文：British investment managers Legal & General and Schroders are to invest hundreds of millions of dollars in commercial property in the United States, but are largely steering clear of the hard-hit office sector, the companies told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国央行注入现金，下调 14 天逆回购利率
item.description: 周一，中国央行数月来首次向银行系统提供 14 天期现金，而且利率较低，这表明央行有意进一步放松银根。【原文：China's central bank supplied 14-day cash to its banking system for the first time in months on Monday and at a lower interest rate, signalling its intent to further ease monetary conditions.】

item.title: 早间竞标期待更多降息
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 三星再投资 18 亿美元在越南建 OLED 生产厂
item.description: 韩国电子制造商三星显示器公司周日表示，计划今年在越南北部投资 18 亿美元建厂，为汽车和技术设备生产 OLED 显示屏。【原文：South Korean electronic manufacturer Samsung Display Co plans to invest $1.8 billion for a factory this year in northern Vietnam to produce OLED displays for automobiles and technology equipment, the Southeast Asian country said on Sunday.】

item.title: 绿党要求降息，澳大利亚央行改革停滞不前
item.description: 周一，拖延已久的澳大利亚储备银行（RBA）改革面临新的挫折，因为绿党议员要求工党政府降低利率，以换取他们对立法的支持。【原文：Long-delayed reforms to the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) faced a fresh setback on Monday as Greens lawmakers demanded the Labor government engineer a cut in interest rates in exchange for their support for the legislation.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：花旗集团在华扩张受阻于美国监管机构
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，在美联储对花旗银行的数据管理和风险控制进行处罚后，花旗集团在中国的扩张计划在美国监管机构面前遇到了障碍。【原文：Citigroup's expansion plan in China has hit a roadblock with U.S. regulators after the Federal Reserve imposed a penalty on the bank for its data management and risk controls, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国降息举措和地缘政治担忧引发油价上扬
item.description: 周一早盘，油价小幅上涨，原因是担心中东冲突可能影响主要产油地区的供应，以及预期美国上周降息将支撑需求。【原文：Oil prices gained slightly during early trade on Monday, boosted by concerns conflict in the Middle East may impact supply in the key producing region and expectations the U.S. interest rate cut last week will support demand.】

item.title: 比特币跳涨，日本假期令多数货币疲软
item.description: 比特币在上周美联储超大规模降息后持续反弹，周一创下一个月新高，而日元和其他大多数主要货币则因日本市场处于假期而停滞不前。【原文：Bitcoin was the notable mover as it reached for one-month highs on Monday, sustaining its rally after the Federal Reserve's super-sized rate cut last week, while the yen and most other major currencies stagnated with Japanese markets on holiday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市持稳，更多降息措施迫在眉睫
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市持稳，此前市场普遍预期各国央行将举行两次降息会议，而美国的关键通胀数据也将为进一步宽松政策亮起绿灯。【原文：Asian stocks were steady on Monday ahead of central bank meetings that are widely expected to deliver two more rate cuts and key U.S. inflation figures that should flash a green light for more easing there.】

item.title: ACCC 就 "虚假 "折扣起诉澳大利亚杂货巨头 Woolworths 和 Coles
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者监督机构在周一提起的诉讼中指控该国最大的两家连锁超市在数百种产品的折扣问题上误导购物者，从而在生活成本危机中加大了对该行业的压力。【原文：Australia's consumer watchdog accused the country's two largest supermarket chains of misleading shoppers about discounts on hundreds of products in lawsuits filed on Monday, tightening pressure on the sector amid a cost-of-living crisis.】

item.title: 英国 Rightmove 拒绝 REA 81 亿美元的甜蜜收购要约
item.description: 澳大利亚房地产上市企业 REA 集团周一表示，英国最大的房地产门户网站 Rightmove 已拒绝了其 61 亿英镑（约合 81.2 亿美元）现金加股票的甜蜜收购要约。【原文：Australian property listing firm REA Group said on Monday that Britain's largest real estate portal Rightmove had rejected its sweetened 6.1 billion pounds ($8.12 billion) cash-and-stock takeover offer.】

item.title: 调查显示，约 40% 的地区、城市和公司缺乏减排目标
item.description: 根据周一发布的一份年度 "盘点 "报告，40%以上的大公司、城市和地区仍未制定任何减少温室气体排放的目标，该报告旨在评估全球在应对灾难性气候变化方面取得的进展。【原文：More than 40% of major companies, cities and regions have still not set any targets to cut greenhouse gas emissions, according to an annual "stocktake" released on Monday to gauge global progress in the fight against catastrophic climate change.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储肾上腺素持续飙升，中国人民银行的惯性思维可能拖后腿
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，阿波罗将向英特尔提供数十亿美元的投资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，美国资产管理公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）已提出向英特尔投资多达 50 亿美元。【原文：U.S.-based asset management company Apollo Global Management has offered to make an investment of as much as $5 billion in Intel , Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 加拿大 Unifor 工会批准与通用汽车的新劳资协议
item.description: 加拿大工会周日表示，安大略省 CAMI 装配厂和电池装配厂的 Unifor 会员批准了与通用汽车公司达成的新集体协议，该协议实现了大幅加薪。【原文：Unifor members at the CAMI Assembly and Battery Assembly plants in Ontario have ratified a new collective agreement with General Motors that achieves significant pay increases, the Canadian labor union said on Sunday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称哈里斯将于本周就美国财富创造问题发布新经济提案
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）计划本周推出一套新的经济政策，旨在帮助美国人积累财富，并为企业制定经济激励措施，以帮助实现这一目标。【原文：U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris plans to roll out a new set of economic policies this week that aim to help Americans build wealth and set economic incentives for businesses to aid that goal, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，台积电与三星商讨在中东地区建设巨型工厂事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，台积电和三星电子已讨论在阿联酋建造巨型综合工厂，这可能在未来几年改变芯片行业。【原文：TSMC and Samsung Electronics have discussed building huge factory complexes in the United Arab Emirates that could transform the chip industry in the coming years, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 马斯克说，SpaceX 计划在两年内向火星发射约五艘无人驾驶的星际飞船
item.description: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周日在社交媒体平台 "X "上发表文章称，该公司计划在两年内向火星发射约五艘无人驾驶的 "星际飞船"。【原文：SpaceX plans to launch about five uncrewed Starships to Mars in two years, Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said in a post on social media platform X on Sunday.】
